summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4272 for the improvement of Kenyon Street, from 1st Avenue South to 5th Avenue South; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50795, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
